/* com.innobiz.orange.web.or.dao.OrOrgBDao.selectOrOrgB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.DEPT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) DEPT_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'ORG_TYP_CD' AND CD = M.ORG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ORG_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.ORG_ABBR_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ORG_ABBR_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.ORG_ID, T.ORG_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.COMP_ID, T.ORG_PID, T.DEPT_ID, T.DEPT_RESC_ID, T.RID, T.SORT_ORDR, T.ORG_TYP_CD, T.SYNC_STEP_CD, T.USE_YN, T.SYS_ORG_YN, T.ORG_ABBR_RESC_ID, T.REF_VA1, T.REF_VA2, T.REF_VA3, T.REGR_UID, DATE_FORMAT(T.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, DATE_FORMAT(T.MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.DEPT_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) DEPT_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM PT_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM PT_CD_B WHERE CLS_CD = 'ORG_TYP_CD' AND CD = T.ORG_TYP_CD) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ORG_TYP_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.ORG_ABBR_RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) ORG_ABBR_RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM OR_ORG_B T
AND T.ORG_ID = #{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.COMP_ID = #{compId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.ORG_PID = #{orgPid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.RID = #{rid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.SYS_ORG_YN = #{sysOrgYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.COMP_ID IN ( #{item, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND T.COMP_ID != #{foreignCompId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ORG_ID
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
